articles.content: The marquee 2022 NBA Finals rematch between the Golden State Warriors and the Boston Celtics was much anticipated if only for what transpired half a year ago between two of the leagues top defenses.… [+10365 chars]

articles.title: How England kept France’s star forward Kylian Mbappe quiet - The Athletic
articles.description: England stifled Mbappe thanks to the alertness of Kyle Walker, players doubling up on the forward and the midfield pressing France's defence
articles.content:
There are a handful of players you need to consider for special attention, England assistant coach Steve Holland said before the quarter-final against France.
